citation: Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2018 (Tas)
text:
Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2018

I make the following order under section 197 of the Inland Fisheries Act 1995 .

11 July 2018

S. COURTNEY

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2018 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which the Inland Fisheries (Recreational Fishing) Amendment Regulations 2018 commence.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 .

6.
    The amendment effected by this clause has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 .

7.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 July 2018
